content.rendered:
*This item has a minimum order quantity of 6*

The Venice Armchair has solid wooden frame and a fantastic look.

With it’s contemporary design it will enhance the look of any venue. This is a high quality chair, which comes in selections of faux leather, fabrics, real leathers and also C.O.M. Please call our office for Fabric, Leather and C.O.M. 

Please note that these chairs have a 2 year warranty.

We work closely with a number of fabric & faux leather mills as well as leather dealers so you can customise your chair to suit you.

– Click here to browse Sunbury Design’s Fabric, Faux Leather and Real Leather ranges.

– Click here to browse Panaz’s Fabric and Faux Leather ranges.

– Click here to browse Crest JMT Leather’s range of leathers to suit all budgets!

We charge to upholster your chair in custom fabrics, fauxs or leathers, we only charge you what the material costs us, plus a small handling fee; which is included in the total price. If you prefer, you can purchase the material yourself and arrange for it to be delivered to our warehouse.

The top of the arm height is 660mm.
